fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 98.90 points or 0.51% to settle at 19,497.30. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.35% to 11.84. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank and Axis Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
